labels.name: P2: Fix can wait a while

data.actual_result: Discord forces you to stay and decide whether to keep or discard changes you can't approve either way.
data.expected_result: You can't make changes but you can leave the page.
data.steps_to_repro: - Right click on a text channel and Edit Channel - Give channel nswf prefix and save. If the save box stays, keep saving until it is gone. - Click on the NSFW Channel slider. It should stay NSFW due to the prefix. - Click Save Changes once. The dialogue box should stay there. - Quit Discord - Have channel editing permissions removed. - You can now get stuck in the Edit Channel window for that channel.
